title: Ground News - Bethlehem in darkness without decorations as Christmas cancelled over Israel-Hamas war
text:
Summary by Daily Mirror It is the very centre of Christianity and at this time of year especially should be filled with pilgrims keen to connect with the birthplace of their Lord, but war has emptied the holiest of towns Share menu More
